title: WATCH: Siya and the Springboks thank SA, call for final wave of support
text:
Cape Town - It's crunch time at the 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan!



Just 80 minutes separate skipper Siya Kolisi and the Springboks from their third Rugby World Cup title after they beat Wales 19-16 in a nail-biting semi-final encounter in Yokohama on Sunday.

And the Boks were quick to thank their supporters after the game - from the changing room no less - with Kolisi calling on South Africa for messages of support in the final week building up to the final against England on Saturday.

Kick-off is at 11:00 SA time.

WATCH the Boks message below:
description: Just 80 minutes separate Siya Kolisi and the Springboks from their third Rugby World Cup title with the team thanking SA for their support and calling for more!
